searchbar.error: There seems to be an error:

register.title: Sign Up
register.error_msg_password_minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
register.error_msg_password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
register.error_msg_password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
register.error_msg_password_number: Password must contain at least one number.

recovery.title: Recover Password
recovery.email_description: Enter your email address so we can send you a link to reset your password.
recovery.email_submit_description: An email has been sent to you with a link to reset your password. If you haven't received any email, please check your spam folder or contact the administrator.

firebase_auth.auth/email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use.
firebase_auth.auth/requires-recent-login: Please sign in again as your last session has expired.
firebase_auth.auth/too-many-requests: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
firebase_auth.auth/cancelled-popup-request: Popup has been closed by the user before finalizing the operation.
firebase_auth.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: An account already exists with different credentials for the same email.
firebase_auth.auth/invalid-verification-id: The verification ID used to create the phone authentication credential is invalid.
firebase_auth.auth/invalid-tenant-id: The tenant ID of the authentication instance is invalid.
firebase_auth.auth/multi-factor-info-not-found: User doesn't have a second factor matching the provided identifier.
firebase_auth.auth/missing-iframe-start: Missing iframe start in the provided URL.
firebase_auth.auth/missing-iframe-end: Missing iframe end in the provided URL.
firebase_auth.auth/phone-number-already-exists: The phone number is already in use by another user.
firebase_auth.auth/app-not-authorized: The app is not authorized to use Firebase Authentication with the provided credentials.
firebase_auth.auth/credential-already-in-use: The credentials are already in use by another user.
firebase_auth.auth/invalid-continue-uri: The continue URL must be a valid URL string.
firebase_auth.auth/invalid-creation-time: Creation time must be a valid UTC date string.
firebase_auth.auth/internal-error: The authentication server encountered an unexpected error while processing the request. Check the error message for more details.
firebase_auth.auth/invalid-argument: An invalid argument was provided for an authentication method.
firebase_auth.auth/id-token-revoked: The Firebase ID token has been revoked.
firebase_auth.auth/id-token-expired: The provided Firebase ID token has expired.
firebase_auth.auth/insufficient-permission: The credential used to initialize the Admin SDK does not have sufficient permissions to access the requested authentication resource.
firebase_auth.auth/email-already-exists: The provided email is already in use by an existing user.

weather_aqi.title: Air Quality
weather_aqi.description_good: Air quality is considered satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk.
weather_aqi.description_moderate: Air quality is acceptable; however, there may be some health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.
weather_aqi.description_unhealthy_f_s_g: Sensitive individuals may experience health effects. It will probably not affect the general population.
weather_aqi.description_unhealthy: Everyone may begin to experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious effects.
weather_aqi.description_very_unhealthy: Health alert: everyone may experience more serious health effects.
weather_aqi.description_hazardous: Health warnings of emergency conditions. The entire population is more likely to be affected.
weather_aqi.index_description:
1: Good. 
 2: Moderate.
 3: Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups.
 4: Unhealthy.
 5: Very Unhealthy.
